meanings.definition: A person or entity that gives or bestows something, typically a gift or privilege.
meanings.sent1: The kind granters donated books to the school library.
meanings.sent2: The granters generously funded the new playground equipment.
meanings.sent3: The granters surprised everyone with a pizza party for the whole class.
meanings.sent4: The granters were like magical fairies, granting wishes to all who asked.
meanings.sent5: The granters' generosity shone brightly in the community.

meanings.definition: The act of granting or giving permission or approval.
meanings.sent1: The granters of the scholarship made many students happy.
meanings.sent2: The granters of the permit allowed the construction to begin.
meanings.sent3: The granters of the vacation days made everyone cheer with joy.
meanings.sent4: The granters of freedom paved the way for a new era of equality.
meanings.sent5: The granters' decision brought relief to all involved.
